medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse abdominal pain for 12 hours, migrating to the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports the onset of diffuse crampy abdominal pain that started 12 hours prior and migrated to the right lower quadrant this morning, accompanied by nausea and dysuria. He denies vomiting, changes in bowel function, fevers, and chills. No prior episodes of similar pain were reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypertension (HTN) and hyperlipidemia (HLD). Previous surgery includes inguinal hernia repair as a baby.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) or gastrointestinal cancers.
